Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Kuyo yomibini kuya kubakho iziqhamo nemithi yesundu nerharnathi
Ziziphi ke ezi ntsikelelo zeNkosi yenu niya kuziphika
Kuyo kuya kubakho abafazi abalungileyo, abahle
Ziziphi ke ezi ntsikelelo zeNkosi yenu niya kuziphika
Abaziimbelukazi	eziya	kujezula	ngokuzibambileyo, eminqubeni emihle
Ziziphi ke ezi ntsikelelo zeNkosi yenu niya kuziphika
Ziziphi ke ezi ntsikelelo zeNkosi yenu niya kuziphika
Zithe zava kwizihlalo ezitofotofo eziluhlaza neenkukho ezintle
Ziziphi na ke ezi ntsikelelo zeNkosi yenu niya kuziphika
Lisikelelekile igama leNkosi yakho, uMnini bungangamsha nozuko
Ke kaloku amadlelane angasekunene; ziintoni na amadlelane angasekunene
Namadlelane	angasekhohlo;	ziintoni	na	amadlelane angasekhohlo
Behleli zava kuzo, bejongene ubuso ngobuso
